name: Saurav Satpute
college: PCETs Pimpri Chinchwad College of Engineering Pune

education.school: PCETs Pimpri Chinchwad College of Engineering Pune

projects.name: Netflix GPT
projects.description: Developed a frontend clone of Netflix using JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, React.js, and Firebase.. Implemented Sign In, Sign Up, Search Movie, and movie details features. Utilized Chat GPT API to enhance movie search functionality based on user input. Demonstrated problem-solving skills and a commitment to user-centric design.

projects.name: Book Resale Store System
projects.description: Developed a web application facilitating student book transactions using JavaScript, Python, Pandas, and NumPy. Implemented a Book Recommendation System employing various machine learning techniques, including Content-Based and Collaborative Filtering algorithms. Demonstrated proficiency in web development, data manipulation, and machine learning techniques to create a robust and user-friendly application.

experiences.description: Developed custom C# code blocks to introduce new functionalities to Blue Prism, expanding its capabilities beyond standard features. Contributed to a C# project for a leading US-based client, delivering high-quality solutions and exceeding expectations in a dynamic team environment. Utilized Blue Prism and Nintex to automate daily computer tasks, enhancing operational efficiency by 100%. Reviewed and authored Process Definition Documents (PDD) and Solution Design Documents (SDD) to provide clarity and insight into processes for clients. Proficient in RPA methodologies, Blue Prism, and Nintex, facilitating seamless integration and optimization of automation solutions.
